html:
11.4.20  5:20 pm   Music - good or bad?

      both. that's what makes it so great

11.4.20  5:13 pm   How do i express love

      any way. or if not, it will express you regardless

11.4.20  4:27 pm   why is it that my projects suddenly come to a grinding halt after about two or three weeks of work?  like i still "want to do it" but it's painful to even look at the file let alone open it

      the project is a little too big for you. this is bad news in one way, but good news in another way, because if you can get through this you will be stronger in the future, and be able to do bigger projects. it might challenge you to come up with new techniques

11.4.20  3:32 pm   when was the last time you had fun

      just a couple moments ago

11.4.20  1:51 pm   why you don't you uppercase letters?

      i do, but that reminds me, i was going to ask you why you don't use them

11.4.20  1:09 pm   What's a good way to be funny without being annoying?

      being serious

11.4.20  1:05 pm   what is the tempo of the new song?

      130

11.4.20  1:03 pm   what would happen if a duck destroyed the universe

      the duck might be destroying itself in the process

11.4.20  1:01 pm   What was your favorite song to record?

      i would prefer to record a new one to be my favorite

11.4.20  12:56 pm   what's your favourite typeface?

      is there one with just the serif

11.4.20  12:17 pm   Why does life?

      to see if it's possible

11.4.20  11:51 am   I write music but I'm starting to dislike my own work. Have you ever felt this way,

     i don't remember

      and if so, how did you overcome the negative feelings?

     i'm not sure

11.4.20  11:30 am   can you show us a drawing of a palm tree?

      sure, there is one in the unboxing video, on the side of one of the boxes

11.4.20  11:06 am   Which is the song you made you enjoyed the most while doing it?

      i would prefer to do a new one to enjoy the most

11.4.20  11:01 am   what do you think is the weirdest animal on earth? 

      computers

11.4.20  10:40 am   is your favourite color giraffe?

      no

11.4.20  10:11 am   will you, give us a lyric, from you, next song?

      i would like to, but that would be irresponsible

11.4.20  10:08 am   Do you ever just ?????

      i would consider it

11.4.20  10:08 am   Does free Will truly exist,

     yes

     or is humanity living in it's own fantasy?

     free will is actually one of the most crucial elements of fantasy

11.4.20  9:57 am   whats a your favorite music

      normal

11.4.20  9:42 am   have you been keeping up with the current memes? 

      yes

11.4.20  8:22 am   Where did all the good times go?

      in all directions

11.4.20  7:17 am   do you create lyrics or the melody first?

     hopefully not. everything works better when it happens both at the same time

     i cant seem to find any melody that sticks when i write songs, it always merges with another song i know unintentionally. i look for inspiration but end up with a cover-

     try using words as you come up with the melody

11.4.20  7:02 am   What happens when my pen turns into cheese?

      then you can write with both sides

11.4.20  6:53 am   do u like stepping on cronchy leaves?

     yes

      have u stepped on any good ones this fall?

      no

11.4.20  6:48 am   I've read an answer on this page where you pretty specificly guess how long your next video will be. Does that mean it is almost finished?

      no. to be fair, i knew the exact length before i even started the video. even before i had even recorded one second of the audio. that's because the video is a song video, and i write with a metronome and i also have a strict company songwriting policy of knowing the entire roadmap before the song is certified as written and ready to record

11.4.20  6:37 am   I support this idea of yours "i am able to do everithing, and i have no limits whatsoever".

     i never had that idea

     Your work is the expression of this infinite potential that I think every human has. But is it really the best way to express it?

      the important part, for me, is that i am able to find A way to express it. there are already at least a trillion ways which would be impossible for me, and that tends to haunt me, but i am able to find my footing usually when i figure out that i just have to find ONE way that works, even if it isn't as majestic as some of the more fanciful ways i might have imagined

11.4.20  5:56 am   What if a trophy wins a trophy?

      the trophy is awarded a trophy for winning that trophy

11.4.20  5:04 am   Any thoughts on making video about the history of COVID-19 when the pandemic is over?

      there are a lot of other videos i would much much rather do, besides that

11.4.20  4:54 am   do you hate it when people ask you the same questions ?

      no

11.4.20  4:45 am   thoughts on india?

      it's pretty good

11.4.20  3:13 am   who's going to water the plant?

      you might have to do it

11.4.20  3:06 am   Why are squares square?

      because you said so

11.4.20  2:22 am   Like everyone else is probably asking, are you working on something?

      yes

11.4.20  1:52 am   Waffles or Pancakes?

      ah, the classic cry of the person who has yet to discover waff cakes

11.4.20  1:49 am   Why don't you ever give direct answers

      i very often do, but, that reminds me, why don't you ever change the theme of your Bambi themed car to another theme, have you thought about maybe a truck themed car

11.4.20  1:46 am   I noticed you answer questions almost all day.

     that's not true, but it reminds me, i've noticed that you drive a Bambi themed car

      How much sleep are you getting?

     about 7 to 10 hours per day

11.4.20  1:40 am   how do i start making music

      i'm not sure

11.4.20  12:55 am   When you make your art, do you do it because you love it,

     yes

      or do you feel a sense of responsibility and urgency to create it.

     yes

     Almost like it needs to be manifested in reality for the sake of it,

     yes

     not because people are waiting for you to do it.

     that is an additional reason, sort of a bonus reason

     I've dabbled in videography and music composition, but I've never been able to be consistent with it. I mean I like it, don't get me wrong, but I don't have this fervor to create. Do you experience this fervor

     yes

      and if so, where does it come from?

     every direction

11.4.20  12:55 am   Thoughts on the ocean?

      it's pretty good

11.4.20  12:53 am   thoughts on politics?

      love them. for christmas i am getting a politic

11.4.20  12:49 am   how to deal with anxiety?

      sing songs of joy

11.3.20  11:25 pm   do you ever thank inanimate objects for doing a good job

      yes

11.3.20  9:58 pm   why don't the things I see make sense anymore?

     perhaps you have become more 'creative'

     They used to have some semblance of reason, but now it's just a bunch of dumb shit I could write whole essays about, but now there's just too much confusion to deal with, what do I do??

      have you tried writing partial essays

11.3.20  9:44 pm   how do you make your videos?

      we'll see

11.3.20  8:43 pm   hey, what do you consider the category for your music? 

      regular

11.3.20  8:41 pm   What continually keeps you excited about music??

      music

11.3.20  7:14 pm   what is normal? 

      how about traveling to the far reaches of outer space

11.3.20  6:56 pm   what would be an inspiration that came out of nowhere?

      an interesting change of weather

11.3.20  5:58 pm   has anyone told you that your music videos aren't just videos to accompany the music but rather a visual form of the music itself?

      i'm not sure, but that has been my plan all along
